Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading image that is taken out of context.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Tsai Ing-wen is inspecting an indoor drill following the military accident, but there is no evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the photo is from a different event in 2016 where President Tsai Ing-wen visited the army.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo is not related to the military accident in July 2020.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by implying that President Tsai Ing-wen is being careless or foolish by inspecting a swimming pool after a fatal military accident.
